a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The period life expectancy at birth, in a given year. Health expenditure includes all financing schemes and covers
all aspects of healthcare. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
Data source: UN, World Population Prospects (2024); OECD Health Expenditure and Financing Database (2023)
Note: Health expenditure data is expressed in international-$ at 2015 prices.
